entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
